name: Lady of Death will help You
name_original: Lady of Death will help You
description:
Priscilla want revenge for her father death. But the killer (Black Knight) is very strong. Fortunately Lady of Death will help Priscilla.

This game was made for the TPS Official Game Jam

Engine and Graphic Assets : RPG Maker MZ

Music : JMZ Party Theme

Game length : 3 - 10 minutes

Game development time : 9 hours

It's my first rpg maker game...regards, Phobos
